mapper.insert: insert into room(title, max_count, cur_count, mode, difficulty, start) values(#{title},#{max_count},#{cur_count},#{mode},#{difficulty},#{start})
insert into userroom(leader, user_id, room_id) values(#{leader},#{user_id},#{room_id})
mapper.select: select room_id from userroom where user_id=#{user_id}
